name: Street Dunk
description:
Grab the ball and set it on fire!

There is only one rule - NO RULES! Well, as long as ball scores the hoop!

Tap at the right moment to shoot the ball. Take your time to find the right curve and score! Execute the clean shot for perfect hit and turn the ball ablaze!

Score all the hoops to complete the level and travel to the next court. Can you dominate them all?

Do you have what it takes to become the best baller on the street?
